metadata.title: CVE-2021-3826 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Heap/stack buffer overflow in the dlang_lname function in d-demangle.c inlibiberty allows attackers to potentially cause a denial of service(segmentation fault and crash) via a crafted mangled symbol.

criterions.comment: gcc-4.4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
